question: A geometric sequence has first term 3 and common ratio 2. Find the 10th term (integer).
Solve for x, give the exact decimal value: 3^(2x+1) = 81.
A circle has radius 5 cm. Compute the arc length for a 120° central angle; round to three decimal places.
Find the remainder when 2^100 is divided by 7 (integer from 0–6).
The mean of five numbers is 22. Four of them are 18, 20, 25, 30. Find the fifth number (integer).
Solve log₂(x) + log₂(x-2) = 3; give the exact value.
A right circular cone has radius 6 cm and height 8 cm. Compute its volume; round to three decimal places.
Evaluate 12C5 (integer).
A quadratic has roots 3 and −4 and leading coefficient 1. Find the coefficient b (integer).
Find the exact sum of the infinite geometric series 8, 4, 2, 1, … .
Solve |2x-5| = 11; give the positive solution (integer).
A sphere has surface area 100π cm². Find its radius; round to three decimal places.
Compute |(2+3i)(4-i)|; round to three decimal places.
Evaluate f'(1) for f(x)=x³-6x²+9x+1; round to three decimal places.
A card is drawn from a standard 52-card deck. Compute the probability it is a heart or a king; round to four decimal places.
Evaluate ∫₀¹ (3x²+2x) dx (integer).
Find the slope of the line through points (2,3) and (7,11); round to three decimal places.
Solve sin θ = 0.5 for 0° ≤ θ < 360°; give the smaller positive solution (integer degrees).
A $10,000 loan earns 5% annual interest compounded quarterly. Compute the amount after 3 years; round to two decimal places.
Compute the largest real root of x³-6x²+11x-6; round to three decimal places.
A parallelogram has adjacent sides 8 cm and 10 cm with included angle 60°. Compute its area; round to three decimal places.
Find the median of 7, 3, 9, 15, 11, 5, 13 (integer).
Evaluate det[[2,3],[4,7]] (integer).
For f(x)=e^(2x) compute f'(0); round to three decimal places.
Solve the system 2x+3y=12, 4x-y=5; give x; round to three decimal places.
A fair coin is tossed 5 times. Compute the probability of exactly 3 heads; round to four decimal places.
Compute the distance between points (1,2) and (7,10); round to three decimal places.
Solve x²-4x+1=0; give the larger root; round to three decimal places.
A cylinder has volume 144π cm³ and height 9 cm. Compute its radius; round to three decimal places.
Evaluate (x²-9)/(x²+4x+3) at x=2; round to three decimal places.
Compute Σ_{k=1}^{20}(2k+1) (integer).
A triangle has sides 7, 24, 25. Compute its area (integer).
Find the determinant of the inverse of [[1,2],[3,4]]; round to three decimal places.
For P(t)=1000e^{0.03t} compute P(10); round to two decimal places.
Solve log₅(x)+log₅(x-4)=1; round to three decimal places.
Compute tan(π/4)+sin(π/6); give the exact decimal value.
Find the length of the space diagonal of a rectangular box with dimensions 3×4×5 cm; round to three decimal places.
Find the coefficient of x³ in the expansion of (2x+1)⁵ (integer).
For g(x)=ln(x²+1) compute g'(1); round to three decimal places.
Solve 4^x=8^{x-1}; give the exact value.
Evaluate lim_{x→2}(x²-4)/(x-2) (integer).
A right triangle has legs 5 and 12. Compute the hypotenuse (integer).
Compute the population standard deviation of 2,4,4,4,5,5,7,9; round to three decimal places.
For the line 3x-4y=12 compute the y-intercept; round to three decimal places.
Solve 2cos²θ-1=0 on 0°≤θ<360°; give the smallest positive solution (integer degrees).
Compute 1+2+…+40 (integer).
A ball's height is h(t)=20t-5t². Compute its maximum height; round to three decimal places.
Compute lcm(18,24) (integer).
Evaluate 5!/(2!3!) (integer).
A cube has volume 216 cm³. Compute its surface area in cm² (integer).
Compute the distance from point (1,2,3) to the plane 2x−y+2z−4=0; round to three decimal places.
Find the angle in degrees between vectors ⟨1,2,2⟩ and ⟨3,0,4⟩; round to one decimal place.
Find the antiderivative of xe^{3x} and evaluate it at x=1, given that the antiderivative equals 0 when x=0; round to three decimal places.
Solve 3^x ≡ 5 (mod 17) for the smallest positive integer x.
Compute the rank of the matrix [[1,2,3],[4,5,6],[7,8,9]] (integer).
Find the exact value of the infinite series Σ_{n=0}^{∞} (-1)^n / 3^n; round to two decimal places.
Compute the determinant of [[2,0,1],[3,1,4],[1,-1,2]] (integer).
For the cubic equation x³+2x-4=0, compute the real root; round to two decimal places.
Evaluate ∫₀^{π/2} sin³x dx; round to three decimal places.
A continuous random variable X has pdf f(x)=2x on [0,1]. Compute E[X]; round to three decimal places.
Find the remainder when 3^{2024} is divided by 11 (integer from 0–10).
A sphere has a radius of 5 cm. Compute its surface area; round to one decimal place using π = 3.14.
Solve the system x² + y² = 25 and x + y = 7 for y (positive solution); round to three decimal places.
Find the trace of the matrix [[5,3],[2,7]] (integer).
Evaluate the limit lim_{x→0} (1-cos x)/x²; round to three decimal places.
Compute 1/2 + 1/4 + 1/8 + … + 1/2^{15}; round to six decimal places.
Find the number of edges in a complete bipartite graph K_{5,4} (integer).
Solve 2^{x+1} + 2^{x-1} = 40 for x; round to three decimal places.
Compute the volume of the tetrahedron with vertices (0,0,0), (1,0,0), (0,1,0), (0,0,1); round to three decimal places.
Evaluate the improper integral ∫_{1}^{∞} 1/x³ dx; round to three decimal places.
Find the smallest positive integer n such that 1 + 2 + … + n ≥ 1000.
The line y=2x+3 intersects the circle x²+y²=25 at two points. Compute the x-coordinate of the rightmost intersection; round to three decimal places.
Compute the magnitude |3-4i| (integer).
Find the eigenvalue of [[3,1],[0,2]] with larger real part (integer).
A fair six-sided die is rolled until the first 6 appears. Compute the expected number of rolls; round to three decimal places.
Evaluate Σ_{k=1}^{10} k² (integer).
Compute the greatest common divisor of 1001 and 1547 (integer).
Find the area enclosed by y=x² and y=4; round to one decimal place.
Solve the differential equation dy/dx = 3y with y(0)=2 at x=1; round to three decimal places.
Compute the number of 3-letter strings with distinct letters chosen from {A,B,C,D,E} (integer).
For f(n)=n⁴, evaluate the 5th finite difference Δ⁵f(0) (integer).
Compute the exact value of Σ_{k=1}^{∞} 1/[k(k+1)(k+2)]; round to two decimal places.
Find the smallest positive integer x such that 2x ≡ 3 (mod 11).
Evaluate the line integral ∫_C (x+y) ds along the straight segment from (0,0) to (1,1); round to three decimal places.
Compute the median of the data set 3, 7, 8, 5, 12, 14, 21, 13, 18 (integer).
Find the exact value of sin(75°); round to four decimal places.
A box contains 4 red and 6 blue marbles. Two marbles are drawn without replacement; compute the probability both are red; round to four decimal places.
Compute the area of the triangle with vertices (0,0), (5,1), (3,4); round to one decimal place.
Evaluate the infinite product ∏_{k=2}^{∞} (1−1/k²); round to six decimal places.
Find the 2024th digit after the decimal point in the decimal expansion of 1/7 (integer from 0–9).
Compute the dot product of ⟨2, −3, 1⟩ and ⟨4, 0, 5⟩ (integer).
Solve 4^x − 2^{x+1} − 8 = 0 for x; round to three decimal places.
Evaluate the definite integral ∫_{0}^{π/4} tan x dx; round to three decimal places.
Compute the number of diagonals in a regular decagon (integer).
Find the radius of the circle x² + y² − 4x + 6y − 12 = 0; round to three decimal places.
Evaluate the 2024th Fibonacci number modulo 1000 (integer from 0–999).
Compute the sample standard deviation of 10, 12, 14, 16, 18; round to two decimal places.
Find the exact value of log₂(128) (integer).
A regular tetrahedron has edge length 6 cm. Compute its volume; round to three decimal places.
Compute the sum of the geometric series 5 + 5/3 + 5/9 + … to infinity; round to three decimal places.
